name: G2 Design
tag_list: graphic-design, advertising, corporate-id-design, branding, website-design, website-development
overview:
G2 Design is a Stellenbosch based graphic design and visual communication agency specialising in strategic brand, corporate identity and website development, corporate brochure, logo and packaging design.

At G2 Design, we are inspired by the delicate nature of relationships. We believe that the connection between people and design is strengthened through nurturing and understanding. We welcome the diversity and challenges that our work offers, and we strive to explore each new environment with wonder and gain insight. To create a strategic impact, we have to understand our customers, and their competitors too. It is about problem solving and crafting a personality profile for a company, product or service. We then develop a design relationship that delivers on your business objectives, that can be used with conviction and lasting effect.
